    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_CFG

        public static final OpaClientConfig DEFAULT_CFG

      • recvBuffLen

        public int recvBuffLen
        Size of the recv/parse buffer in bytes.

      • sendBuffLen

        public int sendBuffLen
        Size of the serializer buffer in bytes.

      • sendQueueLen

        public int sendQueueLen
        Max length of the send queue. When the length is reached, callers will block until a request has been removed from the send queue to be serialized. This is a form of back-pressure.

      • unknownIdHandler

        public OpaClientConfig.RawResponseHandler unknownIdHandler
        Callback to invoke when a response is received without a registered callback.

      • uncaughtExceptionHandler

        public OpaClientConfig.ExceptionHandler uncaughtExceptionHandler
        Callback to invoke when an uncaught exception occurs.

      • clientErrorHandler

        public OpaClientConfig.ExceptionHandler clientErrorHandler
        Callback to invoke when an internal error occurs in the client. Examples could include parse errors or serialization errors.
